img_text: @realjdrankin How redneck is my family? Well, my mother's name is Prissy, my uncle's name is Scooter and my aunt's name is Sissy. And I wish to God I was making this up but l'm not. I'm lucky as hell to escape Texas with just intials for a name. They could have easily introduced me tonight as Bubba Rankin. www.jdrankincomedy.com
